query:
SELECT sc.supplierId, s.companyName, s.offersOutOfHours, sc.city, sc.country 
FROM supplierCoverageAreas sc 
JOIN suppliers s ON s.id = sc.supplierId 
WHERE sc.city = 'Mountain View' 
LIMIT 3

FROM supplierCoverageAreas sc
